title: Volunteering as a Ranked System Analyst
body:
I would like to look into volunteering as a Ranked System Analyst.

I believe I could provide insight and collaborate with other staff to find solutions for progressing the evolution of the ranked system that would solve the majority of problems currently associated with the current system, as well as solidify the game as the most successful and competitive team game and provide a high standard for other game companies to look up to.

I currently reside in the western suburbs of Sydney.

If there is someone that could get in contact with me to discuss the potential of this venture, please do so.

replies.body:
https://www.riotgames.com/en/work-with-us/offices/sydney#job-list

There's nothing available in OCE atm, but I'm sure you've seen what they always say when people ask questions like this, make yourself visible and so on.
Isn't there even a phone number I can ring to actually communicate to someone about this?

They're not exactly that sort of company. You could email through support, but they'll tell you the same thing as anyone asking about jobs. They don't do volunteer anything regarding the actual game, there's way too much sensitive info there for them to not train and pay you, at which point you're looking for jobs in that area, at which point the pathway is to make yourself visible and apply when something comes up.

Hmm that is a shame, the game would be dead before I got into the position relevant for being able to take action to make a change.

Oh well, it will just take an extra 100 generations to make the same intellectual progress as the solution I could manufacture would.

GGWP

http://voyagemia.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/Gatling_gun_salesman_cartoon.gif

Except I'm giving this away for free

I am not looking for employment, or for a support position.

No I have not seen what they say at all.

They really need someone as a ranked system analyst to implement the correct solutions in place, or this game will turn to dust really fast and I am willing to prevent that for free.
